name: Haunted Hotel
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The hotel has an eerie, unsettling atmosphere with the sound of unexplained footsteps and the subtle scent of decay. The air carries the weight of supernatural presence and the mysteries of the past, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of the unknown and the constant feeling of being watched.
